name: Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun
description:
Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun is a strategy game developed by Westwood Studios. It came out on 27-08-1999. It was published by Electronic Arts. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun is available on PC.
It was produced by Brett W. Sperry, Donny Miel and Rade Stojsavljevic. Frank Klepacki and Jarrid Mendelson scored the game.
